long_description: The REI 3-1-1 Air Travel Liquids Bag makes toting along your toiletries simple and hassle-free again. Complies with TSA 3-1-1 rules for carry-on liquids: 3 oz. bottles (sold separately) must be in a 1 qt. bag. Water-resistant bag and zipper help prevent leaks. Included carabiner clips 3-1-1 Air Travel Liquids bag onto carry-on baggage.
short_description: The REI 3-1-1 Air Travel Liquids Bag makes toting along your toiletries simple and hassle-free again.
